txt.en: 'We should not be brazen about our role in Umbar. If you wish to assist us you can speak with me again.' \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Navigate to the Allegiance Panel and pledge to the Order of the Eagle. To do this, click on the triangle on the left side of your toolbar and hover over the Character option to reveal the Allegiances menu option. The shell icon marks the tab that will allow you to see the Allegiances of Umbar and join the Order of the Eagle.</rgb>
How can I join the Order of the Eagle Allegiance?
